description: Minimoonoir Nostr Pubkey Whitelist - Source of Truth for Admin Configuration
_comment: ⚠️ SECURITY WARNING: Replace the placeholder admin pubkey below with your actual admin public key(s) before deployment!
_instructions: 1. Generate a new key pair: npx nostr-tools-cli generate
2. Convert your npub to hex: npx nostr-tools-cli decode npub1...
3. Replace the placeholder pubkey below with your actual admin public key
4. Update VITE_ADMIN_PUBKEY in .env with the same value(s)
5. NEVER commit real admin keys to version control!

admins.name: ⚠️ PLACEHOLDER - MUST BE REPLACED
admins._warning: This is a placeholder key. Replace with your actual admin public key before deployment!
